scripts.prisma:pull:db1: npx prisma db pull --config=./prisma.config.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.prisma:pull:db2: npx prisma db pull --config=./prisma.config2.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config2.ts
scripts.prisma:pull:db3: npx prisma db pull --config=./prisma.config3.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config3.ts
scripts.prisma:pull:all: npm run prisma:pull:db1 && npm run prisma:pull:db2 && npm run prisma:pull:db3
scripts.prisma:push:db1: npx prisma db push --config=./prisma.config.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.prisma:push:db2: npx prisma db push --config=./prisma.config2.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config2.ts
scripts.prisma:push:db3: npx prisma db push --config=./prisma.config3.ts && npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config3.ts
scripts.prisma:push:all: npm run prisma:push:db1 && npm run prisma:push:db2 && npm run prisma:push:db3
scripts.prisma:generate:all: npm run prisma:generate:db1 && npm run prisma:generate:db2 && npm run prisma:generate:db3
scripts.prisma:migrate:deploy:all: npm run prisma:migrate:deploy:db1 && npm run prisma:migrate:deploy:db2 && npm run prisma:migrate:deploy:db3
scripts.prisma:validate:all: npm run prisma:validate:db1 && npm run prisma:validate:db2 && npm run prisma:validate:db3
scripts.prisma:format:all: npm run prisma:format:db1 && npm run prisma:format:db2 && npm run prisma:format:db3
